author: ikrav
body: This PR contains EGM certified cut-based and MVA photon IDs tuned on 80X samples. They are intended to be used on 2016 data. This new photon MVA uses CITK-based isolation calculation that caused several minor changes in EGM sequences that go outside of the new IDs themselves.
title: EGM-certified photon IDs for 2016 data: cut based and MVA
